{{item.category}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ICategory, IProduct, IMenuItem } from '../interface/product'; import { PruductService } from '../service/pruduct.service'; import { MenuItem } from 'primeng/api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { products: IProduct[] = []; filteredProducts: IProduct[] = []; categories: IMenuItem[] = []; searchText: string = ""; constructor( private _service: PruductService, private _route: Router ) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadProducts(); this.loadCategories(); } // ======================= // Load Products // ======================= loadProducts() { this._service.getProductList().subscribe((result: IProduct[]) => { this.products = result; this.filteredProducts = result; // start with all items }); } // ======================= // Load Categories // ======================= loadCategories() { this._service.getCategoryList().subscribe((result: ICategory[]) => { this.categories = result.map(cat => ({ label: cat.category, command: () => this.filterByCategory(cat.category) })); }); } // ======================= // Product Details Page // ======================= detailsPage(productID: number) { this._route.navigate(['/products', productID]); } // ======================= // Category Filter // ======================= filterByCategory(category: string) { this.filteredProducts = this.products.filter(p => p.category === category); } catPage(category: any) { this._route.navigate(['/category', category]); } // ======================= // Search Product (live) // ======================= onSearchChange(event: any) { let search = event.target.value.toLowerCase(); this.searchText = search; this.filteredProducts = this.products.filter(p => p.name.toLowerCase().includes(search) ); } // ======================= // Add to Cart // ======================= addToCart(product: IProduct): void { this._service.addToCart(product); this._service.updateCartCount(); // ðŸ”¥ refresh header badge } }
